_header: O blessed Robert innocent and virgin
Subjects: prayers, to saints; Robert of Bury, saint
_description: Lydgate’s prayer to St. Robert of Bury — five 8-line stanzas (ababbcbc)

BodLauMis683.First Lines:
O blyssed Robert Innocent and virgyneglorious marter gracious &
                    riht good…
BodLauMis683.Last Lines:
…pray for alle tho and kepe hem fro ruynethat do reuerence to
                    both your passioun
BodLauMis683.Attributed Title: HEre begynneth a praier to seynt Robert (f. 22v)
BodLauMis683.Editions:
MacCracken,  Henry Noble,
                        ed.  
             John Lydgate: The Minor Poems, Vol. I: Religious Poems.
EETS
         e.s. 107 (1911; repr. 1961): 138-9.
